languages.text: "Надеюсь, ответственного за пропажу наказали по всей строгости закона?"

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, ответственного за пропажу наказали по всей строгости закона?"

languages.text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, ответственного за пропажу наказали по всей строгости закона?"

traits.locale_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"
"I presume the one responsible was punished to the fullest extent of the law?"
"I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"
"I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"
"I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"
"I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

languages.text: « J'imagine que le responsable a été sévèrement puni... »
languages.original_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que le responsable a été sévèrement puni... »

languages.text: “那个弄丢印章的人应该已经受到严厉惩处了吧？”
languages.original_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

traits.locale_text: “那个弄丢印章的人应该已经受到严厉惩处了吧？”

languages.text: "Ich nehme an, der Verantwortliche wurde schnell und streng bestraft?"
languages.original_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich nehme an, der Verantwortliche wurde schnell und streng bestraft?"

languages.text: «Supongo que el culpable ya ha recibido su merecido castigo, ¿no?»
languages.original_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

traits.locale_text: «Supongo que el culpable ya ha recibido su merecido castigo, ¿no?»

languages.text: 「責任者は、迅速に厳しく処罰されたということでいいな？」
languages.original_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

traits.locale_text: 「責任者は、迅速に厳しく処罰されたということでいいな？」

languages.text: "Herhâlde bunun sorumlusu, hızlı ve sert bir şekilde cezalandırılmıştır."
languages.original_text: "I presume the one responsible was punished promptly and harshly?"

traits.locale_text: "Herhâlde bunun sorumlusu, hızlı ve sert bir şekilde cezalandırılmıştır."
